title: Yaaro Ival Lyrics Thirumanam Ennum Nikkah Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: Yazin Nizar
Music: M.Ghibran
Movie: Thirumanam Ennum Nikkah
Lyrics: Parvathy

Yaaro ival yaaro ival
kandae manam thikkaadho.
sorkkal ellaam sikki kondae
thondai kuzhi vikkaadho.

Ennenna pesa eppadi pesa
oththigai paarthaeney.
punnagai pookka pathiramaaga
semiththu vaithaeney.

Indru booomiyil pookkum vanavil vannam
kanmuney kandaache..
Adhil sannalai konjam
unnudan serthaal enmanam undaache..

Yedho oru yedho oru
maayam kandaen enmunney.
unmai endru thondrum varai
paarthu kondae nindraeney.

Eppadi pesa ullathai veesa
yosithu paartheney.
Inimel indha paadhai eppadi sellum
solidamaataayaa..

Meley podum ilai thirai
thaandi ennai parpaaya.
Sattena paaidhidum saththathai
vittutu enmanam osayai ketpaayaa.

Yedho sonnaaaley...
nesam dhegam vittu sellum
vazhvai paarthu ellum
neeril kottram kanda
meni pola thullum ....(Yaaro ival)

Neeya idhu naana idhu
ennae oru poraattam.
vedangal kalaindhu aattangal mudindhu
endraikku kidaikkum vellottam.
novellaam ....
poividumaa....

Idhu manam konda kurai
edhu varai arai vali
vidamattum thittu thittaai karai.

Yaaro ival yaaro ival
kandae manam thikkaadho.
sorkkal ellaam sikki kondae
thondai kuzhi vikkaadho.

Eppadi pesa ullathai veesa
yosithu paartheney.
oh moththamaai naaney karandhu pogm
nilai kandaney.
Inimel indha paadhai eppadi sellum
solidamaataayaa..

adadaa indha mounam .. kollum
nee vandhu meetpaayaa..
